info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Litchfield, southwestern Berkshire, northeastern Dutchess and southeastern Columbia Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 743 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Copake, or 10 miles west of Great Barrington, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Copake, Sheffield, Canaan, Millerton, Falls Village, Ashley Falls, Salisbury, Hillsdale, Sodom, Ancramdale, South Canaan, Wangum Village, Gomorrah, North Hillsdale, Alander, Taconic, North Egremont, Pulvers Corners, Joyceville and Amesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
